co.cask.cdap.test

Interface ProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of ProgramManager
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlowManager, MapReduceManager, ServiceManager, SparkManager, WorkerManager, WorkflowManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProgramManager, DefaultMapReduceManager, DefaultSparkManager

    public interface ProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>
    Instance for this class is for managing a Id.Program.

      • waitForFinish

        void waitForFinish(long timeout,
                 TimeUnit timeoutUnit)
                   throws TimeoutException,
                          InterruptedException
        Blocks until program is finished or given timeout is reached
        Parameters:
        timeout - amount of time units to wait
        timeoutUnit - time unit type
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if timeout reached
        InterruptedException - if execution is interrupted

      • waitForStatus

        void waitForStatus(boolean status)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the status of the program with 5 seconds timeout.
        Parameters:
        status - true if waiting for started, false if waiting for stopped.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the method is interrupted while waiting for the status.

      • waitForStatus

        void waitForStatus(boolean status,
                 int retries,
                 int timeout)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the status of the program, retrying a given number of times with a timeout between attempts.
        Parameters:
        status - true if waiting for started, false if waiting for stopped.
        retries - number of attempts to check for status.
        timeout - timeout in seconds between attempts.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the method is interrupted while waiting for the status.
